- Outdoor central A/C condenser unit with galvanized metal cabinet and horizontal louvers.
- Brand label: Ameristar Heating & Cooling visible on the front.
- Located at grade level on exterior; appears mounted on a pad with nearby vegetation.
- Exterior surface shows dust/dirt; no visible rust or bent panels; fins behind grill look intact.
- Recommend routine maintenance: clean exterior and coils, and verify airflow clearance around the unit.
